author: epg
msg: A recursive svn add was scheduling items matching the user's ignore
list for addition.  Export svn_wc's ignores functionality and use that
in svn_client to correct this.  Thanks to Karl Fogel for review.
Add prototypes and documentation for svn_wc_get_default_ignores and
